item.title: Food help!
item.dc:creator: @Kindler Kindler
item.description:
@Kindler wrote:

Ok someone help me? when u try to eat in combat it doesnt do it and when ur out it lets you…
here is my eating method

case 391: // Manta ray if (actionTimer == 0) { int health = playerLevel[3]; healing[1] = 24; healing[2] = 24; healing[3] = -1; actionTimer = 3; if (playerLevel[3] <= health) { playerLevel[3] += 27; } if (playerLevel[3] >= getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) { playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); } } break;

Read full topic
